title.label: Needs to be updated for iPhone X and above

content.label: The gesture bar is always active so if you tap it while playing the whole game stops. Also doesn‚Äôt fill the screen. If you have an older phone this game is great

Super awesome game! I played it on my iphone 6 before, but ever since I upgraded to an iphone 11 & got this game again, I immediately realized how the game doesn‚Äôt support my phone‚Äôs screen size, & that‚Äôs honestly the only thing that‚Äôs holding me back into playing the game. Please please upgrade your game asap so that it supports an iPhone X/11 screen!

Well, VOEZ is one of my favorite music game ever but I cannot login to my account for a long time. This freaks me out. It tells me Internet Error all the time. It has been a long time that I cannot login my Facebook account and this is the only account I linked to. When are you fixing this?

Edit: Thanks for fixing the login glitch! I‚Äôm so happy that I can play now!

Hi, I am unable to sign in with Facebook, and that‚Äôs the only place I‚Äôve linked my account. When I open the app and go to sign in, it gives me the four options and I select Facebook and say to continue using that account. After I press ‚Äúcontinue‚Äù, it goes back to the four options and won‚Äôt let me do anything except repeatedly attempt to sign in. The only way to fix this problem is to uninstall and reinstall the app, which is what I had to do yesterday in order to play. This may be an issue caused by the fact that I had previously ‚Äúoffloaded‚Äù the app so it would take up less room on my phone, but whatever caused it, it is still an issue. However, despite the occasional small issues (this being the first major one), I absolutely love this game. VOEZ is my favorite music game to date, even above Rhythm Heaven which I‚Äôve been playing for almost ten years. This game definitely deserves five stars, however I can only give it four for now due to the login issue. As soon as it‚Äôs fixed, I‚Äôll happily give this game a solid five-star review! Thanks, Rayark, for making such an awesome game!

VOEZ needs to be fixed for IPhone X, XR, XS etc, since there isn‚Äôt a home button, while playing it makes it easy to exit or pause the game due to the home bar on the screen and it‚Äôs severely irritating. It makes the game unplayable. Please fix this.

I love this game, but I have to completely reinstall it every single time I want to play because after the first login, regardless of which login method I use, it won‚Äôt let me login again. As much as I love this game I can‚Äôt even play it without having to wait 20 minutes for it to reinstall.
I absolutely love this game but yea, as another review said I can‚Äôt log into Facebook for some reason both on my Samsung phone and my iPad. I really hope it gets fixed. I miss playing :‚Äô((
Add support to iPhone X and up for the screen please!!! :)

My expectation was on the roof with this game because it‚Äôs made by the same Rayark that had never made an unenjoyable game. And OMG!!!! How did this game makes me wanna blow. The gameplay is outstanding, which is a upgraded version of Deemo by adding new mechanics and new efects (it‚Äôs nothing hard to learn but takes time and skill to master). The story is actually pretty interesting in it‚Äôs own way. But the music is the thing that makes this game an Editor‚Äôs Choice for Music Game category. There‚Äôre chill, pop, rock, dance and a lot more, and you don‚Äôt particularly need to unlock them because the Limited Time system lets you try out every single song in the library. Overall, a new standard for Rhythm Game.
There is no story that I can find,just still pictures in the diary that I can unlock by playing songs. So where is storyline?

title.label: This game is awesome. But I think there is some sort of bug.

content.label: I don‚Äôt know if this is only me, but when I try to log in as my Facebook account, it just goes back to where I choose to log in as. I think this is a bug. Can you please fix it?
It quite fire. However, there are some signing in problems.

I would like to give it a full rating, but the game won‚Äôt start when I‚Äôm trying the log in with Facebook. It keeps asking me how I‚Äôd like to log in and I keep clicking Facebook. The game just won‚Äôt let me play.

title.label: Great game but has a problem

content.label:
I personally like this game a lot it‚Äôs a challenge and makes you want to beat each level. Though you can really only play a selection of songs without the use of money. 

But my main concern right now is that every time I exit out of the game and want to play again, I will try logging in with my Facebook account but when I do it doesn‚Äôt log in. I have to delete the app and redownload it. I hope you can fix this :) I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs just my device.

title.label: Great game with no iPhone X resolution

content.label:
I‚Äôve played this game for god knows how long. Spent a really long time getting FCs on high level maps, (and even some awesome all perfects) and yet with the support this game gets, its crazy that the game has no iPhone X support. Cytus, Cytus II, and Deemo all have the game stretched out to fit the display, but VOEZ is just a rectangle with 2 bars on the side. I don‚Äôt understand how a game that looks this nice can have no support for this. 

This game is still great, but another problem is that if you want it get every song, it‚Äôll cost you over $100, when the Nintendo Switch version costs $25 for all the songs. I think there should be some sort of bundle that gets you every song for a set price.

4 star review because I love this game, and it‚Äôs what got me into playing games like osu!, Deemo, Cytus, and a ton of other rhythm games. Thanks to the devs! :D
I‚Äôm connected by my Facebook login. Regardless of the app taking me all the way through the login, nothing happens.
Can't login anymore for some reason. It was fun while it lasted.
Really like the game but I‚Äôm a bit confused why I have to sign in ever time I reopen the app, is there any ‚Äúkeep me signed in‚Äù button or something like that?
This is one of the the greatest games I‚Äôve ever played. It is extremely polished for a mobile game, and it is just beautiful. If you like anime and rhythm games then this is perfect for you.

I remembered this game because my idol anime phase somehow launched an obsession with rhythm games. A few years ago, my friend told me to download this game because she really enjoyed it, so I did. I remembered playing a few songs and thinking the game was just ok and deleting it, but that‚Äôs the same way I felt about Love Live: School Idol Festival before I downloaded it again at the start of my obsession and started to figure out the mechanics. So I decided to download this game again and deleted it immediately when I saw it didn‚Äôt have iPhone X support. As an iPhone XR owner, I hate playing games that don‚Äôt support my screen size. It just makes the game look so unprofessional and usually the touch screen feedback isn‚Äôt as good with an unsupported screen size. It‚Äôs an essential feature that makes the game so much easier to play, and I would definitely be interested in playing again and trying to get into this if only you‚Äôd give the game iPhone X support.
Very fun but wish it filled the iPhone X screen
I bought the 6 pack of keys to get the vocal songs, but it didn‚Äôt load the keys and now I have been scammed of 5 bucks. Otherwise a good game with upbeat songs.

Game is amazing, you won‚Äôt regret anything when down loading this. The Game is great and also the songs on the game are awesome. title.label: Game is becoming outdated, avaliable songs haven't been switched in a while...

content.label: Trust me when I say I love the game, but I'm starting to become upset over the game getting outdated now. First of all, the latest update being last year is not a good sign. And, I've noticed that the roster of songs available for now haven't changed in weeks, probably more. This game is amazing, cute, and pretty, but I'm more worried about what Rayark is doing with it right now.

I‚Äôve been playing this game for years and I love it, my only question is will it be optimized for iphone x soon, if at all? I recently got one and Deemo (another game I‚Äôve played for years) is optimized, and I‚Äôve found myself playing that more because it feels less awkward. Idk maybe it‚Äôs just me, but I‚Äôd appreciate it if it could be optimized soon! Other than that, I absolutely love it! The gameplay is great, the music is beautiful, and it‚Äôs just an amazing game! 10/10
I want to play this game on my iPad pro 11, the latest updating is one y ago

The quality of the game is so good and it doesn‚Äôt lag at all it is super addicting and fun I play this game every single day and there are millions of song choices! I really like this game so I give it a five, there is nothing wrong with it.

Like most free games, VOEZ has some problems with actual game play and such.  The game has tokens that are quite hard to get.  I think there should be multiple ways to get tokens rather than just one.  Another thing is that the actual gameplay (taps basically) are off note/sync and either goes too soon or too early.  The game also has horrible balance with difficulties.  Some are too easy or just too hard, there‚Äôs no in between.

I‚Äôve loved this game ever since it was launched. the visuals are just beautiful, and the mechanics are easy to understand yet unique enough to be extremely engaging. additionally, the songs are just REALLY good.

however, I recently updated to the iphone xr and I noticed immediately that the app hasn‚Äôt been updated yet to accommodate the screen size of the phone! please update the app to accommodate the phones orientation, because having to play the game as it‚Äôs original resolution on a much larger screen makes playing it really difficult. I truly love this game and having to give it up just for this arbitrary reason will make me really upset :(
Plz update the game so the whole screen fits for iPhone X
